info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:31AM CDT until June 25 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WILL AND SOUTHEASTERN DUPAGE COUNTIES... At 130 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Addison to Bolingbrook, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bolingbrook, Wheaton, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, Lombard, Addison, Glendale Heights, Woodridge, Glen Ellyn, Hinsdale, Lemont, Burr Ridge, Oak Brook, Westmont, Lisle, Darien, Villa Park, Northlake and Willowbrook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
